description: An examination of key issues in the law of evidence and topics of particular theoretical or practical importance, including a study of both civil and criminal topics in the context of Queensland and other comparable jurisdictions.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
